attributes.action: Keep Barbers and hairdressers open in tier 4.
attributes.additional_details:
Because although Boris may not care about his trim, us men do.
And due to the dusty feeling you get after not having a skinfade for weeks or months on end, we have had enough and want barbers and hairdressers open during all tiers!
attributes.background: Keep Barbers and Hairdressers open during tier 4 to avoid the closure of smaller businesses.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565234

If you specifically want barbers and hairdressers, but not other personal care/beauty businesses, to be allowed to open, we could accept a petition requesting this, but you would need to provide your full name in order for us to accept your petition.
